content: --संग (निःसंग) {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} not attached or devoted to, regardless of, indifferent to; यन्निःसंगस्त्वं फलस्यानतेभ्यः <ls>Ki. 18. 24.</ls> {2} one who has renounced all worldly attachments; <ls>Mu. 1. 14.</ls> {3} unconnected, separated, detached. {4} unobstructed. (--गं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} unselfishly.
